product_name: Maui Jim Banyans Polarized Sunglasses - Men's
long_description: Maui Jim Banyans polarized sunglasses shade your eyes from the sun's harmful rays. They also boost colors and eliminate glare. Maui Jim polarized technology blocks glare and UV light from all angles; manages harmful blue light and boosts colors for clarity and contrast. Polarized lenses reduce 99% of visible glare from water, snow, sand and pavement for increased visual acuity and decreased eye strain. Lightweight and virtually shatterproof, polycarbonate lenses are 20 times more impact resistant than glass and one-third the weight. Extremely impact-resistant, lightweight Grilamid nylon frames offer consistent fit and flexibility at any temperature. Bronze lenses provide excellent contrast and high light reduction suitable for all light conditions, especially bright, direct sunlight. Adjustable silicone nose pads prevent slippage. Anti-corrosive, stainless-steel pin hinge for durability. Maui Jim Banyans polarized sunglasses come with a semirigid case and a soft pouch for cleaning and storage.
short_description: Maui Jim Banyans polarized sunglasses shade your eyes from the sun's harmful rays. They also boost colors and eliminate glare.
